prospects.name: ABB Ltd
prospects.notes: Active in developing innovative propulsion systems and participating in marine engineering conferences.

prospects.name: BAE Systems PLC
prospects.notes: Recently completed multiple naval propulsion projects; focus on sustainable technologies.

prospects.name: Caterpillar Inc
prospects.notes: Known for excellent marine engines and propulsion systems; engaged in eco-friendly tech integration.

prospects.name: Wärtsilä Corporation
prospects.notes: Leading in hybrid and electric propulsion solutions; committed to sustainability in marine operations.

prospects.name: MAN Energy Solutions
prospects.notes: Provides both propulsion systems and energy-efficient technologies; complies with maritime regulations.

prospects.name: Rolls-Royce plc
prospects.notes: Focus on advanced propulsion technologies; participates in international maritime regulations.

prospects.name: General Electric Company (GE)
prospects.notes: Engages in marine tech and propulsion systems, investments in green technology.

prospects.name: Hyundai Heavy Industries
prospects.notes: Leader in ship propulsion systems; involved in R&D for sustainable marine technologies.
